lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to promote people helping themselves first, and then they can help others. Provide the opportunity, and let them grow.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make the important transition in their lives to a new, and hopefully better, home. It's a ministry of sorts.

lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a team of people who make websites. Mostly, my job is to ensure that they are easy to use.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: It seems so sensible!
lender.occupational_info: I play the violin in a symphony orchestra. I love the music, and consider it a great job because it harms no one :) and usually brings people happiness. Music, like lending through Kiva, extends our community in a wonderful way. My son, Mischa, who is four, helps me with our Kiva loans. We love seeing all the participants and wish them success in improving their lives.

lender.name: Hot Stone Hut
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs with start-up costs.
lender.occupational_info: I pick rocks for hot stone massage sets, and sell them through my website.

lender.name: Dianna
lender.loan_because: I'm saving the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at Simpson College, a liberal arts school in Iowa.

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: Because people are struggling to survive, to feed their children. And I am not.
lender.occupational_info: Some people are born with rare genetic disorders which prevent them from developing normally. My company produces medicines to help these people.

lender.name: Steph & Joe
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.loan_because: http://www.laptopbatterypack.org.uk

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance to improve the life. I believe a small help can make life for someone.

lender.name: Betty and niels
lender.loan_because: to help other people to get a better life.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are not as fortunate as me.

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: I can help women who a less privileged than I am.
lender.occupational_info: Community based research in Bonn/Germany.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I do not have a lot of money and this is a great way for someone like me to give again and again. I find Kiva addictive and put gift certificates at the top of all my wish lists! Micro loans are proven and a great way to help others. I am so happy to be a part of this.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a hair dresser.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you wish to see in the world"
lender.occupational_info: I'm a bank teller, helping people make good financial decisions for themselves and their families future.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It can be so overwhelming to find ways to make a difference, but this is one way that I can join with others around the world and know that I've done something that matters.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children who are not reading at all, or are not reading as well as others in their class, and I help them until they are able to catch up to the other students.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a high school teaching English and Literacy skills.

lender.name: Lida
lender.loan_because: I was in Cambodia recently. Noticed how resourceful Cambodians are. I think this is a great way to contribute to that.

lender.name: Robert & Diane
lender.loan_because: I want others to have opportunity to become all God intends for them.
lender.occupational_info: Robert (Bob) is a sales rep in the flower industry and Diane is an inner-city kindergarten teacher.

lender.name: Mariana
lender.loan_because: 25 $ makes big difference in many peoples life
lender.occupational_info: I live in Lisbon, Portugal. I work in a swimming pool and in a gymnasium with children with disabilities doing therapy and adapted physical activity. My dream is to create ballet classes for children with disabilities and perhaps a group of classical dance for all. It has been hard but I believe I will do it one day.

lender.name: Jendayi
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings by helping improve the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I help students who are studying law, develop critical thinking and analytical writing skills for law school, state licensure and the practice of law.

lender.loan_because: I feel it is a right thing to do and micro loans are interesting
lender.occupational_info: I do occupational medicine, trying to promote good working conditions.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I have so much. I wish to pay forward the blessings that I enjoy. I want to share and give others opportunity.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: I own 2 businesses and I enjoy helping people and seeing their dreams come to fruition.
lender.occupational_info: I own a residential real estate appraisal business in the USA in New York and a construction management firm (prime contractor) working within the veterans affairs and dept. of defense systems.

lender.loan_because: I believe the entire world can be impacted by helping one less fortunate person.
lender.occupational_info: I make pottery and sculpture and sell my work in art galleries.

lender.occupational_info: Helping childeren and their parents with problems in education and development.

lender.name: Angela

lender.name: Eric M.

lender.occupational_info: I have the good fortune of introducing young children to school and teaching them for their first year beginning literacy skills.

lender.name: Melina, Stephen & Emely
lender.loan_because: We want to show Gods love by helping people, so that they can use their talents and gifts to make a living out of it!
lender.occupational_info: We go to a christian private school, in Norway.

lender.name: Kurtis
lender.occupational_info: Government.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others in any little way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled and live at home.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of using Kiva's person-to-person micro-lending as a way of empowering people in communities around the world. The method is a great way to give entrepreneurs a "hand up" and not just a "hand out". This, combined with the ability to reinvest money once a loan has been repaid, attracted me to Kiva as a way to sustain a positive impact as a member of the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a city planner in local government here in Texas. Planning is a dynamic profession that works to improve the welfare of people and their communities by creating more convenient, equitable, healthful, efficient and attractive places for present and future generations.

lender.name: Hudson
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that are hard working and decent but live in countries where opportunity rarely comes knocking.
lender.occupational_info: I take the photos that you see in ads and magazines.

lender.name: Briana
lender.loan_because: I like to help others
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in the 10th grade (high school)

lender.name: Ranylt

lender.occupational_info: I do research on humanitarian literature.

lender.name: Wakas
lender.loan_because: i choose to.
lender.occupational_info: If one were to service a machine, by simply doing one small positive act, such as oiling a cogwheel (i.e. a component of the machine), then whilst the act was done on only one part of the machine, it would be true to say that one served the whole of it. ~ ibadat/servitude

lender.loan_because: I want to help! I live pretty much paycheck to paycheck but I can certainly spare $25 to help someone else better themselves and their community. It's only a little bit to give but it helps someone out there a LOT.

lender.occupational_info: I work with pharmaceutical companies to help them launch new drugs.

lender.name: Epism
lender.loan_because: Epism Principle #7 is: "When able, do more than your share in helping others who are struggling to help themselves... Genuinely enjoy sharing"
lender.occupational_info: Epism is simply a set of Twelve Principles, which help individuals (and community entities) to live more successfully.

lender.name: LETS
lender.loan_because: We prefer to help those trying to help themselves than let our membership money sit in the bank earning paltry interest and really doing nothing.
lender.occupational_info: We are a non-profit trading group who participate in a system of alternative trading known as LETS that enables its members to exchange a wide variety of goods and services using little or no cash. It is a method of trading which depends on energy, skills and time instead of money, exchanging a unit of local currency (Shells), not as an alternative to conventional money but to complement the current system of trade.

Thanks & Regards
lender.occupational_info: Coming month i will start a mini mart in my area. In this area having more than 3000 houses. also having some shops. But i want to start a new shop with quality product with reasonable price. Also i paid the shop lot advance and will doing shop arrangements.

lender.name: J Clan
lender.loan_because: We believe in paying it forward and giving back to the community. Through entrepreneurship, families will be fed and educated thus fostering the future of the children globally.

lender.name: d.c.
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Difficult, but rewarding.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I'm a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. As a Christian, I believe in giving women a helping hand as they try to make a better life for their families. I got a money gift for Christmas, so I decided to pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I used to teach at a university, but now I am busy raising my four daughters full-time.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: People should help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. I work for large companies when they need to build new software.

lender.name: Royden
lender.loan_because: Helping someone get on their feet to support themselves, and their families is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info:
My job is to calculate the structural skeleton on buildings so that they are economical to build, yet strong enough to last.
However aside from work, I am just marginally less boring.
I spend a lot of time on the computer researching whatever catches my eye on a given day, from medieval dietary staples, to the latest computer processors; I also read the news from all around the world.
I am an avid reader, reading mainly science fiction and fantasy; I probably finish 2-3 novels a week, including re-reading many of my favorites. I am also very much into Role Playing Games (RPG), both on the computer and with a weekly Dungeons & Dragons game held in my basement. I have written a few short stories, and have started a few novels, but nothing I really consider good enough, perhaps I am too critical of myself.
When not doing what I ask of it, my computers power is lent out to researchers to try to make the world a better place thru a number of research projects, thru the World Community Grid.

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: What a great way to give people the help they need!

lender.name: KARON
lender.loan_because: I know an income is essential to changing peoples lives and it will lead to their family members health and education improving. I just want to make a difference to other's lives and this is a small way for me to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse helping people to improve their health when they come to see one of the 11 doctors I work for. I see myself as a healer.

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: I love to give to other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am in Grade 6 in public school. I am from Vancouver and love to play hockey.

lender.occupational_info: I sell homes to buyers and sell homes for owners.

lender.occupational_info: I help companies find ways to generate profitable growth

lender.occupational_info: I am a manager at a pet store. I used to own my own business, and my son and I are excited to help someone else own or expand their business.
